// store the 0-based line number for any matched line
let match_lines: Vec<_> = lines
    .iter()
    .enumerate()
    .filter_map(|(i, line)| match line.contains(pattern) {
        true => Some(i),
        false => None,
    })
    .collect(); // turns anything iterable into a collection
